class zBuilder.nodeCollection.NodeCollection[source]¶
add_data(key, name)[source]¶

appends a mesh to the mesh list

Args:
key (str): places data in this key in dict. name (str): name of data to place.

appends a node to the node list

Args:
node (obj): the node obj to append to collection list.

Example:

string_replace(search, replace)[source]¶

searches and replaces with regular expressions items in data

Args:
search (str): what to search for replace (str): what to replace it with
Examples:

# replace r_ at front of item with l_ z.string_replace(‘^r_’,’l_‘)

# replace _r at end of line with _l z.string_replace(‘_r$’,’_l’)

Raises:
IOError: If not able to write file

zBuilder.nodeCollection.replace_longname(search, replace, longName)[source]¶

does a search and replace on a long name. It splits it up by (‘|’) then performs it on each piece

Args:
search (str): search term replace (str): replace term longName (str): the long name to perform action on
returns:
str: result of search and replace
